# Welcome to Quarto

### Open-souce scientific and technical publishing system built on Pandoc.


[Get Started](get-started.html){.btn .btn-success .btn-lg role="button"}
[Guide](docs/guide/){.btn .btn-info .btn-lg role="button"}
::: 

::: {.g-col-lg-6 .g-col-12}
#### Scientific publishing with Quarto

- Author with equations, citations, cross-references, sub-figures, layout panels, callouts, and more.
- Embed code and output from Python, R, and JavaScript via integration with [Jupyter](https://jupyter.org/), [Knitr](https://yihui.org/knitr/), and [Observable](https://github.com/observablehq/)
- Publish high quality documents, reports, presentations, websites, and books in a multitude of formats.
:::
